thread.title: D3W dedicated server: Essential Files to host

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
I would like to get your opinion which files you guys consider essential to host on our server.

Please don't suggest official support files like patches or SDK's - these will always be available from the developers / publishers website and simply chew away bandwith from our place.

Pease don't suggest mods or maps either at this stage or highjack this thread with how important maphosting is.

I think more about tools, cleaned up files, essential plugins for the editor - things like that.

post.author: voldemort
post.body:
moths prefab pack
s@tanic's func_rotatingdoor
pbmax's water,portals
all other water hacks since those seem to be the most desired
clean packs
md5 tools like the ever so popular exporter
a text file for newbies that they can copy the contents of to add to their shortcut for the editor to set all the appropriate parameters without having to keep asking a thousand times
The portal gun for prey
the gravity gun for vanilla doom3
